name: Flying Saucer News [Great Britain] (IAPSOP)
content:
Flying Saucer News [Great Britain] (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Flyinmg Saucer News (Great Britain) Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Flying Saucer News. The Official Journal of the Flying Saucer Club of Gt. Britain / Journal of the British Flying Saucer Bureau and FLying Saucer Club. Other titles: Flying Saucer News Bulletin 1953--1955 Quarterly Hove, England. Publisher: Bristol Flying Saucer Bureau. Editor: Thomas M. Cornelia; Richard Hughes. Succeeded by: Flying Saucer News Bulletin Corporate author: Flying Saucer Club (England) 1/1, Spring 1953-Spring 1955. 20 pp. (varies), 1/- a copy plus postage. The first seven issues were copies of typewritten pages. The journal featured reports and eye-witness accounts of UFOs around the world, book reviews and reports of investigations by the Flying Saucer Club and other clubs around Britain. BL Issues:Flying Saucer News Gb Autumn 1953 Flying Saucer News Gb Spring 1955 Flying Saucer News Gb Summer 1955 Flying Saucer News Gb Autumn 1955 Flying Saucer News Gb Spring 1956
